item.description:
Hi Members,

1) Our next meetup will be at Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer St, Holliston, MA (508) 429 1500, from 3-5pm on Dec. 6th, Sunday.

All small dogs are welcome. Please RSVP and let me know what food or beverage you can bring.

2) Our other meetup site, Best Friends, in Sudbury, has asked me to restrict future meetups to the times of 11 am to 1 pm on Sundays. Since I am unavailable at those times, anyone that would like to help me organize and host these meetups should please contact me. Otherwise, this site's meetups will be discontinued.

Have a very Happy Thanksgiving!

Small dog best,
Kim

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dog Meetup , December 6th, Sunday, 3-5pm, Holliston Meadows
